title: Ethereum Cat Herders Meeting #70
body:
## Date and Time

Oct 26, 2021, at 15:00 UTC

## Location 

Zoom: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/84834303064?pwd=YTVDNUxvSjEzL1VTOXNoNmI1a2RlZz09

Video at YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A

## Agenda

New users on ECH Discord and/or contributor's introduction

### 1. Network upgrade  
- [Altair](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs#altair)
- [Arrow Glacier](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/arrow-glacier.md)
- [Merge](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/blob/master/Merge/mainnet-readiness.md) - Amphora testnet- [Pithos](https://www.coincashew.com/coins/overview-eth/guide-or-how-to-setup-a-validator-for-ethereum-staking-on-pithos-testnet-in-10-minutes-or-less)


### 2. ECH updates
- [ECH website updating](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/issues)
- [ECH engineering](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues/231) 
- Cat blazers
- [EIP Insight](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EthereumImprovementProposalsInsight)
- [Peep an EIP](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxqu0PKKyMzG_3BJV_xZTi1F)  - **Upcoming** meetings can be found on [PEEPanEIP schedule](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/projects/2)

- [Meeting notes](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1axM1KaKc-GCcoPbAnYTOhgLnxXsBVoO5XRjTN3CLnck/edit#gid=0) and action items for ECH 
  - All Core Dev meeting [124](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/403)
  - Consensus meeting 74 
  - The Merge (no meeting)
  - EIP Improvement Process meeting 42

### 3. New ideas - brainstorming
- OpenEthereum client support
- Adding DEGEN bot in ECH Discord server
- NFT for EIP authors (Final EIPs)
 
### 4. Events & Hackathon
- [ECH Community Hall in association with ETH Builders NYC & Blockchain NYC](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d1FuHbbGJwM)
- [hackCBS 4.0](http://www.hackcbs.tech/) - 29th-31st October

### 5. ECH funding
- Funding via ESP, Gitcoin, CLR & Moloch

### 6. Discuss and close the ECH GitHub Issues/PRs
- [ethereum-cat-herders/PM](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues)
- [ethereum-cat-herders/funding](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/funding/issues)

### 7. Review of outstanding action items from previous ECH meetings
- [Meeting 69](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/blob/master/All%20Ethereum%20Cat%20Herder%20Meetings/Meeting%20069.md)

- Anything else?
#### The date for the next meeting - Nov 09, 2021.
